short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension loads into new tab,and converts the ES 2015 javascript code to ECMA 5 version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension which   creates your new tab into code editor split version.
You can write ES 2015 code  and simultaneously see its converted version(ECMA 5).
This can be used as quick demonstration , testing or poc purposes.

Extension works offline need to connect to internet.
